value.name: Surge in crime on Halesowen estate leads to action from MP
value.description: A SURGE in crime on a Halesowen estate has led Halesowen MP James Morris to become involved in the issue. Residents on the Abbeyfields estate have expressed concerns over car crime, anti-social behaviour and burglaries over the last few months.

value.name: Intramurals are ‘back, back again’
value.description: For the first time in over a year, intramural sports are back beginning with softball on April 10.

value.name: Myrtle Beach police arrest five people connected to suspected theft ring
value.description: Police said Andrew Morton, Shawna Cook, James Morris and Brittany Davis were involved in the theft ring. Investigators said Davis would trade the stolen good from his group for drugs or money.
